name: Grout
description: A RomM client for NextUI and muOS
author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.2.0: Platform mapping tweaks, multi-file ROM downloads, bug fixes and more!
changelog.v1.2.1: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.2: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.3: Background art downloads moved to the foreground due to inadvertent early termination.
changelog.v1.2.4: Correct check for the muOS info folder to determine the proper mnt path to use.
